【美国圣公会】(Episcopal Church)指美国独立革命后继承美洲殖民地的英国国教的美国基督教团体。欧洲以外最早建立的圣公会教会…

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from ecclesiastical Latin episcopatus 'made a bishop', from episcopus 'bishop', from Greek episkopos 'overseer' (see bishop)
